description.value:
Your familiar attunes itself to your magic, to devastating and draining effect. Your familiar gains the following activity.

Familiar Blast 2 Frequency once per hour; Effect Your familiar fires a blast at a creature within 30 feet, dealing @Damage[10d10] damage of your preferred element, with a basic Fortitude save against your spell DC.

If the creature fails its save and takes damage, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 4} on a critical failure). You may regain any one spell you had prepared today in a slot lower than your highest-rank spell slot, or in one of the additional spell slots granted by your discipline. If you have focus spells, you may instead choose to regain 1 Focus Point.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.j31Ae3YYiQadYtKn]{Familiar Blast}

value.value: Craft Minion or Entwined Souls discipline
